name: Lore: The Hunt
description:
Lore: The Hunt is an asymmetric 4 versus 1 horror game based around Lore. Play as the unrelenting Mysterious Man or one of the cunning Intruders as they try to break into the catacombs under Grandpa's Cottage.

The Maps
- Enter one of many maps with procedurally spawned locations and objectives
- Bend the maps to your advantage by destroying supports, jumping off ledges and vaulting windows



Disruption
- Separate Intruders from their objectives
- Distract and Bait Intruders using their Teammates

Protection
- Defend the objectives at all costs
- Pressure Objectives with different abilities
- Don't let Intruders into the catacombs

Capture
- Send Intruders to cages to trap them
- Protect the cages until the gas settles in



Teamwork
- Assist your team by tackling objectives
- Save your teammates from cages and protect them

Chase
- Master the art of landing by using structures to your advantage
- Dodge the Hunter's lunges and stall for time

Survival
- Hide from the intruder if you can't run
- Locate the catacomb entrances and prepare to escape

Will you escape into the catacombs, or will you succumb to the gas.
OR will you be the one behind the Intruders' demise?
The choice is yours.
